text: Sakari Olkkonen (15 January 1931 - 15 January 2002) was a Finnish gymnast. He competed in eight events at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2002 deaths Category:Finnish male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of France Category:Gymnasts at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Vyborg
title: Sakari Olkkonen
